trans-unit.source: Recover an Azure SQL database using Geo-Restore with REST API
trans-unit.target: Recover an Azure SQL database using Geo-Restore with REST API

trans-unit.source: Geo-Restore, Microsoft Azure SQL Database, restore database, recover database, REST API
trans-unit.target: Geo-Restore, Microsoft Azure SQL Database, restore database, recover database, REST API

trans-unit.source: Recover an Azure SQL database using Geo-Restore with REST API
trans-unit.target: Recover an Azure SQL database using Geo-Restore with REST API

trans-unit.source: Overview
trans-unit.target: Overview

trans-unit.source: This guide shows you how to recover an Azure SQL database using REST API.
trans-unit.target: This guide shows you how to recover an Azure SQL database using REST API.

trans-unit.source: Links to more detailed operations are provided.
trans-unit.target: Links to more detailed operations are provided.

trans-unit.source: Geo-Restore is the core disaster recovery protection included for all Basic, Standard, and Premium Azure SQL Databases service tiers.
trans-unit.target: Geo-Restore is the core disaster recovery protection included for all Basic, Standard, and Premium Azure SQL Databases service tiers.

trans-unit.source: Restrictions and Security
trans-unit.target: Restrictions and Security

trans-unit.source: See <link><linkText>Recover an Azure SQL Database using Geo-Restore in the Azure portal</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: See <link><linkText>Recover an Azure SQL Database using Geo-Restore in the Azure portal</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: How to: Recover an Azure SQL database using REST API
trans-unit.target: How to: Recover an Azure SQL database using REST API

trans-unit.source: Get your list of recoverable databases using the <link><linkText>List Recoverable Databases</linkText><title></title></link> operation.
trans-unit.target: Get your list of recoverable databases using the <link><linkText>List Recoverable Databases</linkText><title></title></link> operation.

trans-unit.source: Get the database you want to recover using the <link><linkText>Get Recoverable Database</linkText><title></title></link> operation.
trans-unit.target: Get the database you want to recover using the <link><linkText>Get Recoverable Database</linkText><title></title></link> operation.

trans-unit.source: Create the recovery request using the <link><linkText>Create Database Recovery Request</linkText><title></title></link> operation.
trans-unit.target: Create the recovery request using the <link><linkText>Create Database Recovery Request</linkText><title></title></link> operation.

trans-unit.source: Track the status of the recovery using the <link><linkText>Database Operation Status</linkText><title></title></link> operation.
trans-unit.target: Track the status of the recovery using the <link><linkText>Database Operation Status</linkText><title></title></link> operation.

trans-unit.source: Next steps
trans-unit.target: Next steps

trans-unit.target: For more information, see the following:
